npc.shop_owner.female.1.greeting.default: Heya %player%. It's good to see you!
npc.shop_owner.female.1.talk.1: Buy something from my shop will ya!
npc.shop_owner.female.1.talk.2: I heard crops can sometimes grow to very big sizes.
npc.shop_owner.female.1.follow.yes: Where do you want to go?
npc.shop_owner.female.1.follow.no: I have something to do right now. Maybe next time...
npc.shop_owner.female.1.dating.yes: I... didn't think that day would come but yes!
npc.shop_owner.female.1.dating.no: Sorry but i don't feel that way
npc.shop_owner.female.1.divorce.not: Huh? Why are you giving me that?
npc.generic.quest.ship_turnip.start:
Are you here for my request?
I will show you how to ship items to make money: Shipping items is very simple. First you need a shipping bin. It can hold any shippable items in it.
Put the items you want to ship in it and everyday in the morning your items will be automatically shipped. Lets try it out now: I want you to ship a turnip.
npc.generic.quest.ship_turnip.end: Great. There are a lot of items you can ship to make money. Here takethese turnip seeds. It should come in handy.
npc.shop_owner.female.1.dislike: Why would you give this to me???
npc.shop_owner.female.1.like: Thanks! I can totally sell this... Huh? I said nothing.
npc.shop_owner.female.1.gift.default: Thank you. Come crops would be nice.
